name: Cushcore Pro Tire Inserts with Valves Set
categories: Pro Tire Inserts with Valves Set
description: Free your wheels from a life of servi-"tube".Durable foam inserts reduce the risk of pinch flats.CushCore 44mm Presta valves are precision-machined aluminum.Recommended inner rim width 22-35mm.Recommended rim height up to 30mm.Included: 2 valves, 2 tire inserts, rim stickers and valve core tool.
